DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : SECURITIES
DOC.TEXT: Wall_Street Money Laundering Panel Formed : A securities industry committee headed by a Merrill Lynch & Co . lawyer is searching for improved ways of identifying and prohibiting money_laundering in the securities industry . The panel was formed at the request of the U.S. Treasury and the U.S. Customs Service , a Dean Witter spokesman said . Federal regulators have seized more_than $ 10 million from customer accounts at Merrill Lynch , Dean Witter , Prudential Securities and PaineWebber Group .
